title: LoL Client Alpha
body:
Good afternoon,

Just noticing a few things in the alpha client that strike me immediately regarding picking your roles, and the pick/ban phase.

First, picking your roles is considerably slower. I'm not sure if the click and drag to selection has been implemented yet, but the response is very slow compared to the current client.

Second, in the pick/ban phase, if players are very quick regarding their ban or lock in, no animation or sound is played, which can leave it a little ambiguous. I don't have a capture device to actually film this, but if someone out there can do it, please chuck it into the replies.

Cheers,


Zedrona

replies.body:
Hey Zedrona,

That's great feedback! In order to ensure it reaches the right people, please post your feedback in the Alpha Client Discussion sub-boards, linked below:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client

Thanks!
